summary: This is a brief email chain from August 14, 2019, referencing an upcoming New York Times report. The email suggests the Times will report that personnel at the Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC) falsified records, likely in relation to the circumstances surrounding Jeffrey Epstein's death.

events.title: Anticipation of NYT Report on MCC
events.description: An email indicates the New York Times will soon report that personnel at the Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC) falsified records.

keyFacts: The email chain is dated August 14, 2019, shortly after Jeffrey Epstein's death in custody on August 10, 2019.
It references an imminent New York Times report concerning personnel at the Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC).
The core allegation in the referenced report is that MCC personnel falsified records.
